title: 81/234/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 March 1981 approving the outline plan of agricultural advisory work in Italy pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 270/79 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 23 March 1981 approving the outline plan of agricultural advisory work in Italy pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 270/79 (Only the Italian text is authentic) (81/234/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The outline plan of agricultural advisory work in Italy forwarded by the Italian Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 270/79 on 6 August 1980, concerning which further details were supplied on 17 October 1980 and 30 January 1981, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to Italy.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 March 1981.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 38, 14.2.1979, p. 6.
